faq.question: How do payouts work?
faq.answer: Payouts are available after 14 trading days with a minimum payout of $1,000. You keep 80% of profits with a 20% split to My Funded Futures. Maximum payout is $100,000.

faq.question: What is the drawdown mode?
faq.answer: My Funded Futures uses end-of-day trailing drawdown that becomes static after your first payout. This provides flexibility during evaluation and stability during funded trading.

faq.question: Is there an activation fee?
faq.answer: No, there are no activation fees for My Funded Futures accounts. You only pay the one-time evaluation fee to start trading.

faq.question: What happens if I hit the drawdown limit?
faq.answer: If you hit the maximum drawdown limit, your account will be reset. You can purchase a reset for the same price as a new evaluation account.

faq.question: What is the consistency rule?
faq.answer: The consistency rule requires you to maintain profitable trading days. For evaluation accounts, you need to maintain 50% consistency to pass to the funded phase.

faq.question: Can I trade during news events?
faq.answer: No, all accounts must be flat/no orders +/-2 minutes around any data release. This restriction applies to evaluation, Sim-Funded, and Live accounts across Scale, Core, and Pro plans. Violation results in account breach.

faq.question: What is the minimum trading days to pass evaluation?
faq.answer: My Funded Futures requires 2 days minimum to pass evaluation across all plans (Scale, Core, Pro). This is explicitly stated in their 'Traders Evaluation Simplified' table.

faq.question: What's the 14-day RISE payroll cycle and when do I get paid?
faq.answer: In Starter & Expert plans payouts are processed every 14 days through RISE once eligibility rules (winning-day count & consistency) are met; typical processing time: 6-12 h (Starter) or 1-3 biz days (Expert).

faq.question: How does the Eval-to-Live $2K micro-scaling ladder work?
faq.answer: After passing E2L you start live with $2K balance, $500 DLL, 1 mini / 10 micros. Hitting profit milestones raises balance, DLL & contracts (e.g. $4K â†’ 2 minis, etc.) up to custom scaling beyond $20K.
